Gnome troops are soldiers of the Gnome Army found on the Khazard Battlefield and within the Tree Gnome Stronghold. At Khazard Battlefield, they can be found swamping the Khazard troopers most of the time. When they are attacking or being attacked by Khazard troopers, they will say phrases such as "You will never get us without a fight!" and "Tally ho!"

While in the Tree Gnome Stronghold, they have a Talk-to option, and will talk to players about the Khazard Battlefield and ask to join them in their cause.

Contents

  • 1 Location
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
  • 3 Dialogue
  • 4 Trivia

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Strangely, talking to them in the Tree Gnome Stronghold will make them say what they do on the Khazard Battlefield, where they will say "Can't you see we are trying to win a battle here?", even though there is no battle going on in or around the Tree Gnome Stronghold.

[[File:Gnome troop chathead.png|left]]
'''Gnome troops''' are soldiers of the [[Gnome]] Army found on the [[Battlefield|Khazard Battlefield]] and within the [[Tree Gnome Stronghold]]. At Khazard Battlefield, they can be found swamping the [[Khazard trooper]]s most of the time. When they are attacking or being attacked by Khazard troopers, they will say phrases such as "You will never get us without a fight!" and "Tally ho!"

While in the Tree Gnome Stronghold, they have a Talk-to option, and will talk to players about the Khazard Battlefield and ask to join them in their cause.
